title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Prosciutto Poppers

instructions.1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
instructions.2: Toss Brussels sprouts with olive oil in a rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper.
instructions.3: Roast in preheated oven for 25 minutes. Stir Brussels sprouts and continue baking until tender, about 15 minutes more.
instructions.4: Heat a skillet over medium-high heat; cook and stir prosciutto until crisp, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat.
instructions.5: Allow Brussels sprouts to rest for 5 minutes. Thread a Brussels sprout half on a toothpick, followed by a few chunks of prosciutto and another sprout half. Repeat with remaining sprouts and prosciutto.

questions.question: In Step 5, is the prosciutto from Step 4 being used?
Is prosciutto from Step 4 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is skillet from Step 4 still available in Step 5?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 4?
If we skip Step 4, is it still valid to use the prosciutto in Step 5?
Can we preheat (Step 1) and roast (Step 3) at the same time?
